meta.title: Blockchain-based Software Solutions | Intellectsoft US
meta.description: Dedicated development team of app developers and augmented staff solutions by Intellectsoft. IT staff augmentation services for software app development.
meta.keywords: dedicated developers, staff augmentation, dedicated team, technical staffing, developers company, it staff augmentation, staff augmentation services, staff augmentation companies, app developers, app developer

title: Blockchain-based Software Solutions
subtitle: Decentralize and secure your enterprise by employing blockchain-based ledgers, identity solutions, custom tokens, and smart contracts.

first_screen.title: Blockchain-based Software Solutions
first_screen.lead: Decentralize and secure your enterprise by employing blockchain-based ledgers, identity solutions, custom tokens, and smart contracts.

second_screen.title: Blockchain-based Ledgers
second_screen.lead: Encrypt your assets with decentralized blockchain-based ledgers, create your own decentralized virtual currency system, or take advantage of an identity solution. Blockchain-based technologies will safeguard your enterprise from a wide range of malevolent activities, like fraud and double-spending.

third_screen.title: Smart Contracts & Smart Tokens
third_screen.lead: Introduce a new level of trust between your business and your clients with custom smart contracts for decentralized applications for Ethereum blockchain. Streamline your operation by delegating them to smart contract code. Use smart tokens as in-app currency or for initial coin offerings.

fourth_screen.title: Wallet Software & Applications
fourth_screen.lead: Leverage virtual cryptocurrency within an online marketplace or within an app to create value for its first users and facilitate early network growth. The early adopters will gain profit from token cost growth, which in turn will lead to increasing platform growth and new users.

sixth_screen.title: Blockchain Wallet App
sixth_screen.lead: Intellectsoft developed an application for iOS and Android that allows the users to make a simple motion to instantly transfer their cryptocurrency to the recipient in close proximity or at a distance. As a result, the app’s users are able to effortlessly send cryptocurrency by staying anonymous both digitally and physically.

portfolio.title: We Have Worked With
portfolio.lead: We have developed mobile applications and enterprise software suites for these companies:

items.title: Harley-Davidson
items.lead: A Fortune 500 IT company needed software that would report data from a smart device designed to collect pressure and time data.

items.title: Jaguar Land Rover
items.lead: The Jaguar Talk solution is a multilingual mobile application that lets users leap over language barriers with ease.

items.title: Cirrus Insight
items.lead: Cirruspath was behind the highest-rated app for integrating Salesforce with a user’s email inbox. Cirrus Insight Mobile helps you leverage your sales data to gain valuable insights and uncover new opportunities.

content.title: What we can do for you
content.lead: We started by making software for startups, moved to building enterprise apps so clients can connect their business to their employees, and now, we’ve structured a staff augmentation and dedicated team service to make our talent more accessible to clients while allowing them to keep full control over their projects.
list: Your desire to succeed can only be rivaled by ours. Any personnel changes or additions that need to be made—will be
We take care of compensation, taxes, benefits, travel expenses, and replacements. All that’s left for your business is success
We are confident in the quality of our outstaffing services and our ability to compete with in-house development.
We help you fill long and short-term technical staff gaps without having to worry about costs associated with seasonality or staffing changes.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.lead: Contact us to take the first step towards creating software that will drive your business forward.
